keyword: how many calories in mandarin oranges
title: How Many Calories in Mandarin Oranges?
meta_description: Learn how many calories in mandarin oranges per medium fruit, plus carbs, fiber, protein, and full nutrition facts for easy tracking.
h1: How Many Calories in Mandarin Oranges?
assumptions: Fresh, medium-sized (about 75g), peeled, no added sugar or preservatives.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by size, variety, ripeness, and preparation (fresh vs. canned); check labels for packaged products.

quick_answer.text: One medium mandarin orange provides about 47 kcal, mostly from natural sugars and carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Canned in light syrup (drained, per equivalent orange)
Add 1 tsp sugar coating per orange
Eat the peel (adds fiber, minimal calories)

faqs.q: How many calories in one mandarin orange?
faqs.a: About 47 kcal for a medium fresh mandarin orange.
They have ~11.7 g carbs per medium orange, mostly natural sugars, with 1.8 g fiber.

faqs.q: How much sugar in mandarin oranges?
faqs.a: Around 9.7 g natural sugars per medium fruit.

faqs.q: Calories in canned vs fresh mandarin oranges?
faqs.a: Canned in syrup adds 15â€“30 kcal per orange; choose juice-packed for fewer calories.

faqs.q: Do mandarin oranges have fat or protein?
faqs.a: Very low: 0.3 g fat and 0.7 g protein per medium orange.
